nodes.text: Uhr-Vah-Vo TechWorks was a Tiss'shar-operated company that operated during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. A couple of decades prior to the outbreak of the Clone Wars, the company produced the Model 88-series administration droid, which was intended for use as a clerical and administration droid. The droid attracted the attention of the InterGalactic Banking Clan, and the Clan purchased the majority of the production run, and later bought out Uhr-Vah-Vo.
